26 Aug 2017

Team Montreal’s Deep-Performance Dwelling has been erecting up on the campus of McGill University! It seems that they are running ahead of most teams to win time for international shipping and contest preparation. Great job!

08 Aug 2017

Team Shunya (India) released its group photo! This ambitious troop from South Asia has made brilliant achievements in previous SD, and has been doing fabulously so far campaigning for Solar Decathlon China 2018! One more year to go! Let’s rock it!
